content: under your chin so the hat stays on when you fly away on your broom~ brim string tied at inner back point ✧ ∞ community ∞ ✧ ༺ ༻ notes all contents of this pattern are subject to copyright laws no part may be copied sold or redistributed in any way i d love to see your fo post your project on ravelry so i can gush over it or if you have any trouble we can problem solve together thanks for crocheting with me ♥
